result.reason: Same root cause as #1794, #3069, #2166 — ConnectionWindow disposed object accessed via async Control.Invoke during close; already fixed in v1.79.0 via PR #3106 with comprehensive dispose guards in ConnectionWindow and ProtocolBase.
result.approach: Already fixed — dispose guards (IsDisposed checks before Control.Invoke calls) were added in v1.79.0 PR #3106; close as duplicate/resolved.
